txt.en: The Shakh-hai of Isengard have come to claim the last wood standing in Nan Curunir -- Quickbeam's grove.\n\nYou must aid in its defence, and ensure that none escape to warn Saruman of the presence of an Ent so close to Isengard.
Observe the confrontation between Ordwaer and Saruman.
Ordwaer's nerve appears near to broken beneath the power of Saruman's voice. Speak with him and try to bolster his resolve.

'I must return to the Ford now, [placeholder].

'I wish you would not remain here in this forsaken place, but you have your own business to be about.

'May fortune ride with you!'

'Grimbold told me that you were last seen heading into Nan Curunir, [placeholder], but I confess I did not expect to encounter you here.\n\n'While I was sent alone to avoid raising the ire of Isengard, I have had a distinctly unwelcome feeling since I entered Nan Curunir, and I think I should welcome some company before I reach the gates of Isengard.'
Speak with Ordwaer about his conversation with Saruman.
